ai-tha-ap253:1.2_0: such a one, the great hermit,
ai-tha-ap253:1.3_0: when they hear a teaching, they’ve been saged.
ai-tha-ap253:2.2_0: Homage to you, supreme among men!
ai-tha-ap253:2.3_0: he’ll be full of many coals.
ai-tha-ap253:2.4_0: as he’s teaching the deathless state.
ai-tha-ap253:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap253:4.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap253:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgāmaputta.
